org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.tools

クラス CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.tools.CLI
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Configurable, Tool
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    JobClient

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public class CLI
extends Configured
implements Tool
    Interprets the map reduce cli options

      • run

        public int run(String[] argv)
        throws Exception
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: Tool
        Execute the command with the given arguments.
        定義:
        run インタフェース内 Tool
        パラメータ:
        argv - command specific arguments.
        戻り値:
        exit code.
        例外:
        Exception

      • getCounter

        protected long getCounter(Counters counters,
              String counterGroupName,
              String counterName)
                   throws IOException
        例外:
        IOException

      • getTaskLogURL

        protected static String getTaskLogURL(TaskAttemptID taskId,
                   String baseUrl)

      • displayTasks

        protected void displayTasks(Job job,
                String type,
                String state)
                     throws IOException,
                            InterruptedException
        Display the information about a job's tasks, of a particular type and in a particular state
        パラメータ:
        job - the job
        type - the type of the task (map/reduce/setup/cleanup)
        state - the state of the task (pending/running/completed/failed/killed)
        例外:
        IOException - when there is an error communicating with the master
        InterruptedException
        IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid type/state is passed

      • displayJobList

        public void displayJobList(JobStatus[] jobs)
                    throws IOException,
                           InterruptedException
        例外:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • main

        public static void main(String[] argv)
                 throws Exception
        例外:
        Exception
